title: Riot help my hacked account
body: I tried to submit to Riot that my account had been hacked by going to riot games support. However I can not log in because I do not have the access to my password and username. Please help guide me riot. How can I give you guys personal information?

replies.body: Okay thank you so much! I have had sent one about several hours ago. Please help me get it back. I had been trying to get it back myself, just not sure how to. Thank you so much Porocles!

Hey no worries, you'll actually want to fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) instead.  This will allow you to input an email we can reach you at without needing to login.  We'll reply back as soon as we can to help with recovery and updating your info!
